bonus.value: Increase damage progressively by 1% upon hitting a target. Stack up to 10/13/16/20 times. Last for 1.5 seconds.
Increase Dual EM Stars' electrical explosion damage by 16%/22%/30%/40% of ATK.

mind.name: Just Kidding
mind.desc: If you said her jokes are corny, she would reply, "Why so serious?"

memory.name: Dearly Departed
memory.desc: One who lives in the past is unreachable and can't let go.

belief.name: Silver Bullet
belief.desc: She owns a silver bullet. Is she hunting vampires?

emotion.name: Future Focus
emotion.desc: She's always certain of her destiny.
